flow.convergenceReady: Entered convergence stage. Click "Start review" to collect member REVIEWs, then resolve issues from the board.
flow.controllerSuggested: Controller suggested convergence. You can start review rounds and then confirm execution.
flow.convergenceModeBusy: Convergence is still processing. Finish the current mode first.
flow.autoExecuteMessage: Confirm execution and dispatch tasks now.
flow.memberBackfilled: Backfilled shared outputs for new member {{agentId}}.
flow.resolveMissingEmpty: All members are missing. Please add members before continuing.
flow.invalidPlanOutput: Controller PLAN is not valid JSON. Please retry.
flow.pendingBootstrap: Detected {{count}} missing roles. Confirm to batch create and initialize them.
flow.pendingBootstrapBlocked: Please handle missing-role creation confirmation before sending more messages.
flow.bootstrapFinalizeFailed: Members were created, but executable tasks are still missing. Please review the PLAN.
flow.bootstrapCancelled: Cancelled missing-role creation and returned to discussion.
flow.controllerDriftBlocked: Controller attempted orchestration tools in {{phase}}: {{tools}}. Ignored and asked for protocol output.
flow.controllerDecisionFailed: Controller decision still invalid after retries. Please answer in structured format.
flow.discussionRoundLimitReached: Controller research reached round limit ({{count}}). Please provide more input or move to planning.
flow.convergenceRoundLimitReached: Convergence round limit reached ({{count}}). Proceeding to final blueprint decision.
flow.convergenceDefaultsApplied: Applied default values for {{count}} pending decisions.
flow.convergenceDecisionsApplied: Applied your provided values for {{count}} pending decisions.
flow.convergencePendingDecisions: Convergence produced {{count}} required decisions. Confirm once to continue (supports apply-all-defaults).
flow.convergenceBlockedBackToPlanning: Convergence still has blockers. Forced back to planning.
flow.convergenceDecisionUnresolved: Required decisions are not resolved yet. Execution is blocked.
flow.convergencePendingDecisionBlocked: Pending required decisions detected. Confirm them in the convergence panel (or apply all defaults) before continuing.
flow.convergencePendingDecisionChatOnly: Pending decisions still exist; switched to controller Q&A mode. You can also confirm decisions in the panel first.
flow.memberMentionNotFound: Member not found: {{target}}. Use @memberId 回答.
flow.memberMentionDefaultPrompt: Please answer based on the current plan and convergence context.
flow.noExecutableTask: No executable tasks found in PLAN.
flow.taskPartial: Task is partially complete and needs follow-up.
flow.teamDeletePartial: Team deleted, but partial cleanup failed: {{error}}

deleteDialog.title: Delete Team
deleteDialog.description: This action deletes the team and its session data, and cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.scope: Team artifacts will also be deleted (canonical + mirrors).

convergence.title: Convergence Panel
convergence.pendingHint: Required decisions are unresolved; execution is blocked. You can confirm all defaults once.

bootstrap.missingAgent: Controller agent not found. Create it before using team collaboration.
bootstrap.missingFiles: Controller agent is missing required files: {{files}}
bootstrap.agentsMdEmpty: Controller AGENTS.md is empty. Complete setup before continuing.
bootstrap.checkFailed: Failed to check controller readiness. Please retry.
